nodes.text: The Blue Dragon was a pirate organization based in the Heaven system of the Oplovis sector. The most powerful crime syndicate in the Galactic Republic system, the Blue Dragon had ties to high-ranking officials of the Heaven-earth corporation, the company that ruled the Heaven system. The criminal organization was led by an individual known as the "dragon head," and was hostile towards the Knights of Silver Dawn, mercenaries who worked for profit as well as to supply their community on the planet Wind, an orbit of the Heaven system.
